Enchantment 6

Ziz

Summon Units:#1388 Ziz
The Ziz is a dead, rotting Great Eagle given false life by a necromancer. The beast is possessed by a spirit from the Underworld. It is enchanted with Air magic and can fly even during storms and it is surrounded by an icy wind that freezes the flesh of those nearby.
